attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: A TreeNode instance as the backing model.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used to refer each treenode data during rendering.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Specifies the ajax/client toggleMode. Default is false.
attribute.name: dynamic

attribute.description: Specifies caching on dynamically loaded nodes. When set to true expanded nodes will be kept in memory. Default is true.
attribute.name: cache

attribute.description: Javascript event to process when a tree node is clicked.
attribute.name: onNodeClick

attribute.description: TreeNode array to reference the selections.
attribute.name: selection

attribute.description: Style of the main container element of tree.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the main container element of tree.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Highlights nodes on hover when selection is enabled, set to false to disable highlighting.
attribute.name: highlight

attribute.description: Unique key of the data presented by tree nodes.
attribute.name: datakey

attribute.description: When enabled, Displays slide effect during toggling of a node.
attribute.name: animate
